sen.j: 上賀茂民芸協団（かみがもみんげいきょうだん）は、京都市上賀茂にあった民芸運動の実験工房。
sen.e: Kamigamo Mingei Kyodan (Kamigamo Folk Craft Association) was a group for promoting the Mingei (National Art) Movement, which existed in Kamigamo, Kyoto City.
Kamigamo Mingei Kyodan (Kamigamo Folk Craft Association) was a craft center for the Mingei (National Art) Movement, which was located in Kamigamo, Kyoto City.
Kamigamo Mingei Kyodan (Kamigamo Folk Craft Association) was a craft center for the Mingei (National Art) Movement, which was located in Kamigamo, Kyoto City.

sen.j: のちに人間国宝となった黒田辰秋らによって1927年（昭和2年）に設立された。
sen.e: This group was organized in 1927 by the later Living National Treasure Tatsuaki KURODA and others.
This group was organized in 1927 by the late Living National Treasure Tatsuaki KURODA and others.
This group was organized in 1927 by the late Living National Treasure Tatsuaki KURODA and others.

sen.j: 柳宗悦が1926年（大正15年）にはじめた民芸運動に大きな影響を受けている。
sen.e: This group was also influenced by the Mingei Movement started by Muneyoshi YANAGI in 1926.
They were greatly influenced by the Mingei Movement started by Muneyoshi YANAGI in 1926.
They were greatly influenced by the Mingei Movement started by Muneyoshi YANAGI in 1926.
Kamigamo Mingei Kyodan was organized in 1927.
Kamigamo Mingei Kyodan was founded in 1927.
Kamigamo Mingei Kyodan was founded in 1927.
